message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $20,000. What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14,000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but this product is very valuable to me.  How about we meet in the middle at $17,000?
I understand your attachment to the product, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $15,500?
